mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspSchwdAltrtvUrl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ SCHWD_NM , SCHWD_PGE_NM , SCHWD_ALTRTV_URL , SCHWD_ALTRTV_URL_DSCR , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_SCHWD_ALTRTV_URL WHERE 1 = 1 AND SCHWD_NM = #{schwdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspSchwdAltrtvUrl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_SCHWD_ALTRTV_URL WHERE 1 = 1 AND SCHWD_NM = #{schwdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
